text.div:
VhDir Validation Need Value Set

Attested information varies in the ability to be validated and the frequency of validation. For example information that is purely attested and never validated may be the self-declared “cultural competencies”. A degree from an institution will need to be validated only a single time. A license that expires would require revalidation based on an expiration date. This value set defines a set of codes to describing the need and frequency of validation.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-validation
    CodeDisplay
    nonenoneNo validation needed/planned for this resource or element (Frequency)
    initialValidation is only needed after initial attestation. For elements that typically do not change such as 'medical school attended and graduation date'.to review
    periodicValidation is needed after initial attestation and on a periodic basis. E.g. elements that expire or may change such as licensure.to review

name: VhDir Validation Need Value Set

For example information that is purely attested and never validated may be the self-declared “cultural competencies”. A degree from an institution will need to be validated only a single time. A license that expires would require revalidation based on an expiration date. This value set defines a set of codes to describing the need and frequency of validation.

contains.display: Validation is only needed after initial attestation. For elements that typically do not change such as 'medical school attended and graduation date'.
Validation is needed after initial attestation and on a periodic basis. E.g. elements that expire or may change such as licensure.
